title: Ask about the price of skin of other sever (Viet Nam).
body:
So i come from Viet Nam, and recently they sell lux skin with the price of 999 and 1399, which mean it's almost the same as sever NA (about ~22$ => 32$ ?. 1$ = ~22k Dong), their reason is they sell the special Elementalist Icon and Elemental Origin Border too with the price 100rp/1 (for 999rp pack) and  Master Edition available with exclusive icons and ward (ward ~ 350rp, normaly it's 65rp/1) . You can see it here: http://luxnguyento.lienminh.garena.vn/infos
And i hear that skin riot only sell at 520 750 975 1350 1820 and 3250, mean 99 149 199 299 399 and 799 in VN (20k = 40rp, 50k = 100rp). Few month ago they change the price and it's change very random, many of it is more expensive then it should be. So may i ask that Ganera Viet Nam (who manage the game in my country) is allow to do that ? Am i been scam ? Because i don't want to play the game that try to do that to me (even it's a good game and i have a lot of skin), or at least the sever. 
Thanks you and hope you guys can understand and answer my question. Sorry for my English.

replies.body:
As much as I'd love to help, if you're playing on the Garena VN server, you'll have to contact the [Garena Support team](http://intl.garena.com/support/) to inquire about content pricing and any other questions.

I hope this helps.
